verses.niv: 11 For I know the plans I have for you," declares the LORD, "plans to prosper you and not to harm you, plans to give you hope and a future.
verses.esv: 11 For I know the plans I have for you, declares the LORD, plans for welfare and not for evil, to give you a future and a hope.
verses.kjv: 11 For I know the thoughts that I think toward you, saith the LORD, thoughts of peace, and not of evil, to give you an expected end.

verses.niv: 18 Then Jesus came to them and said, "All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. 19 Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, 20 and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."
verses.kjv: 18 And Jesus came and spake unto them, saying, All power is given unto me in heaven and in earth. 19 Go ye therefore, and teach all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Ghost: 20 Teaching them to observe all things whatsoever I have commanded you: and, lo, I am with you alway, even unto the end of the world. Amen.
verses.esv: 18 And Jesus came and said to them, “All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. 19 Go therefore and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, 20 teaching them to observe all that I have commanded you. And behold, I am with you always, to the end of the age.”

verses.niv: 28 And we know that in all things God works for the good of those who love him, who have been called according to his purpose.
verses.kjv: 28 And we know that all things work together for good to them that love God, to them who are the called according to his purpose.
verses.esv: 28 And we know that for those who love God all things work together for good, for those who are called according to his purpose.

verses.niv: 13 Now all has been heard; here is the conclusion of the matter: Fear God and keep his commandments, for this is the whole duty of man. 14 For God will bring every deed into judgment, including every hidden thing, whether it is good or evil.
verses.kjv: 13 Let us hear the conclusion of the whole matter: Fear God, and keep his commandments: for this is the whole duty of man. 14 For God shall bring every work into judgment, with every secret thing, whether it be good, or whether it be evil.
verses.esv: 13 The end of the matter; all has been heard. Fear God and keep his commandments, for this is the whole duty of man. 14 For God will bring every deed into judgment, with every secret thing, whether good or evil.

verses.niv: 4 The LORD works out everything for his own ends- even the wicked for a day of disaster.
verses.kjv: 4 The LORD hath made all things for himself: yea, even the wicked for the day of evil.
verses.esv:
4   The LORD has made everything for its purpose,
    even the wicked for the day of trouble.

verses.niv: 10 For we are God's workmanship, created in Christ Jesus to do good works, which God prepared in advance for us to do.
verses.kjv: 10 For we are his workmanship, created in Christ Jesus unto good works, which God hath before ordained that we should walk in them.
verses.esv: 10 For we are his workmanship, created in Christ Jesus for good works, which God prepared beforehand, that we should walk in them.

verses.niv: 9 But you are a chosen people, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people belonging to God, that you may declare the praises of him who called you out of darkness into his wonderful light.
verses.kjv: 9 But ye are a chosen generation, a royal priesthood, an holy nation, a peculiar people; that ye should shew forth the praises of him who hath called you out of darkness into his marvellous light:
verses.esv: 9 But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for his own possession, that you may proclaim the excellencies of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light.

verses.niv: 8 The LORD will fulfill his purpose for me; your love, O LORD, endures forever- do not abandon the works of your hands.
verses.kjv: 8 The LORD will perfect that which concerneth me: thy mercy, O LORD, endureth for ever: forsake not the works of thine own hands.
verses.esv:
8   The LORD will fulfill his purpose for me;
    your steadfast love, O LORD, endures forever.
    Do not forsake the work of your hands.

verses.kjv: 16 For by him were all things created, that are in heaven, and that are in earth, visible and invisible, whether they be thrones, or dominions, or principalities, or powers: all things were created by him, and for him:
verses.niv: 16 For by him all things were created: things in heaven and on earth, visible and invisible, whether thrones or powers or rulers or authorities; all things were created by him and for him.
verses.esv: 16 For by him all things were created, in heaven and on earth, visible and invisible, whether thrones or dominions or rulers or authorities—all things were created through him and for him.

verses.niv: 11 so is my word that goes out from my mouth: It will not return to me empty, but will accomplish what I desire and achieve the purpose for which I sent it.
verses.kjv: 11 So shall my word be that goeth forth out of my mouth: it shall not return unto me void, but it shall accomplish that which I please, and it shall prosper in the thing whereto I sent it.
verses.esv:
11   so shall my word be that goes out from my mouth;
    it shall not return to me empty,
  but it shall accomplish that which I purpose,
    and shall succeed in the thing for which I sent it.

verses.niv: 21 Many are the plans in a man's heart, but it is the LORD's purpose that prevails.
verses.kjv: 21 There are many devices in a man’s heart; nevertheless the counsel of the LORD, that shall stand.
verses.esv:
21   Many are the plans in the mind of a man,
    but it is the purpose of the LORD that will stand.

verses.niv: 1 There is a time for everything, and a season for every activity under heaven:
verses.kjv: 1 To every thing there is a season, and a time to every purpose under the heaven:
verses.esv: 3:1 For everything there is a season, and a time for every matter under heaven:

verses.niv: 2 "I know that you can do all things; no plan of yours can be thwarted.
verses.kjv: 2 I know that thou canst do every thing, and that no thought can be withholden from thee.
verses.esv:
2   “I know that you can do all things,
    and that no purpose of yours can be thwarted.

verses.niv: 19 Do you not know that your body is a temple of the Holy Spirit, who is in you, whom you have received from God? You are not your own; 20 you were bought at a price. Therefore honor God with your body.
verses.kjv: 19 What? know ye not that your body is the temple of the Holy Ghost which is in you, which ye have of God, and ye are not your own? 20 For ye are bought with a price: therefore glorify God in your body, and in your spirit, which are God’s.
verses.esv: 19 Or do you not know that your body is a temple of the Holy Spirit within you, whom you have from God? You are not your own, 20 for you were bought with a price. So glorify God in your body.

verses.niv: 11 In him we were also chosen, having been predestined according to the plan of him who works out everything in conformity with the purpose of his will,
verses.kjv: 11 In whom also we have obtained an inheritance, being predestinated according to the purpose of him who worketh all things after the counsel of his own will:
verses.esv: 11 In him we have obtained an inheritance, having been predestined according to the purpose of him who works all things according to the counsel of his will,

verses.niv: 10 I make known the end from the beginning, from ancient times, what is still to come. I say: My purpose will stand, and I will do all that I please.
verses.kjv: 10 Declaring the end from the beginning, and from ancient times the things that are not yet done, saying, My counsel shall stand, and I will do all my pleasure:
verses.esv:
10   declaring the end from the beginning
    and from ancient times things not yet done,
  saying, ‘My counsel shall stand,
    and I will accomplish all my purpose,’

verses.niv: 31 So whether you eat or drink or whatever you do, do it all for the glory of God.
verses.kjv: 31 Whether therefore ye eat, or drink, or whatsoever ye do, do all to the glory of God.
verses.esv: 31 So, whether you eat or drink, or whatever you do, do all to the glory of God.

verses.niv: 9 who has saved us and called us to a holy life--not because of anything we have done but because of his own purpose and grace. This grace was given us in Christ Jesus before the beginning of time,
verses.kjv: 9 Who hath saved us, and called us with an holy calling, not according to our works, but according to his own purpose and grace, which was given us in Christ Jesus before the world began,
verses.esv: 9 who saved us and called us to a holy calling, not because of our works but because of his own purpose and grace, which he gave us in Christ Jesus before the ages began,

verses.niv: 36 For from him and through him and to him are all things. To him be the glory forever! Amen.
verses.kjv: 36 For of him, and through him, and to him, are all things: to whom be glory for ever. Amen.
verses.esv: 36 For from him and through him and to him are all things. To him be glory forever. Amen.

verses.niv: 8 He has showed you, O man, what is good. And what does the LORD require of you? To act justly and to love mercy and to walk humbly with your God.
verses.kjv: 8 He hath shewed thee, O man, what is good; and what doth the LORD require of thee, but to do justly, and to love mercy, and to walk humbly with thy God?
verses.esv:
8   He has told you, O man, what is good;
    and what does the LORD require of you
  but to do justice, and to love kindness,
    and to walk humbly with your God?

verses.niv: 16 But I have raised you up for this very purpose, that I might show you my power and that my name might be proclaimed in all the earth.
verses.kjv: 16 And in very deed for this cause have I raised thee up, for to shew in thee my power; and that my name may be declared throughout all the earth.
verses.esv: 16 But for this purpose I have raised you up, to show you my power, so that my name may be proclaimed in all the earth.

verses.niv: 2 Do not conform any longer to the pattern of this world, but be transformed by the renewing of your mind. Then you will be able to test and approve what God's will is--his good, pleasing and perfect will.
verses.kjv: 2 And be not conformed to this world: but be ye transformed by the renewing of your mind, that ye may prove what is that good, and acceptable, and perfect, will of God.
verses.esv: 2 Do not be conformed to this world, but be transformed by the renewal of your mind, that by testing you may discern what is the will of God, what is good and acceptable and perfect.

verses.niv: 19 Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, 20 and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."
verses.kjv: 19 Go ye therefore, and teach all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Ghost: 20 Teaching them to observe all things whatsoever I have commanded you: and, lo, I am with you alway, even unto the end of the world. Amen.
verses.esv: 19 Go therefore and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, 20 teaching them to observe all that I have commanded you. And behold, I am with you always, to the end of the age.”

verses.niv: 7 everyone who is called by my name, whom I created for my glory, whom I formed and made."
verses.kjv: 7 Even every one that is called by my name: for I have created him for my glory, I have formed him; yea, I have made him.
verses.esv:
7   everyone who is called by my name,
    whom I created for my glory,
    whom I formed and made.”
13 The end of the matter; all has been heard. Fear God and keep his commandments, for this is the whole duty of man.
verses.kjv: 13 Let us hear the conclusion of the whole matter: Fear God, and keep his commandments: for this is the whole duty of man.
verses.niv: 13 Now all has been heard; here is the conclusion of the matter: Fear God and keep his commandments, for this is the whole duty of man.
